articles.title: Labor denies dumping policy to pay super on parental leave
articles.text:
Labor denies dumping plans to pay super on government-funded parental leave, as new research shows the gender gap in super balances among young professionals climbing to a new high.

articles.title: 'Stinky rapist' kept in jail indefinitely
articles.text:
A man who bound, gagged and repeatedly raped a teenager in her home will remain in prison indefinitely, after a Queensland court intervened to stop his release.

articles.title: 'Not much to celebrate' as gender pay gap narrows slightly
articles.text:
On a per-hour comparison, the gap is narrower. According to ABS employee earnings data from August last year, the hourly earnings for men were $37.50 compared with $34.60 for women.

articles.title: Qld man admits retirement home sex assault
articles.text:
A 78-year-old retirement home resident who indecently touched four girls came to the attention of police when he confessed to being sexually attracted to children, a court has heard.
